TOP 0.0.0.9000

Reference

All functions

assemble_TOP_training_data()

Assemble TOP training data for all TF x cell type combos, then split training data into 10 partitions

assemble_partition_training_data()

Assemble TOP training data for all TF x cell type combos in one partition

bam_sort_index_stats()

Sort and index the BAM file, and retrieve stats (idxstats)

bin_transform_counts()

Binning and transform count matrix

combine_TOP_samples()

Combine and take the average of TOP posterior samples from all partitions

count_genome_cuts()

Count DNase-seq or ATAC-seq cleavage along the genome

count_normalize_chip()

Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage

extract_TOP_coef_samples()

Extract alpha and beta coefficients from TOP posterior samples

extract_TOP_mean_coef()

Compute TOP posterior mean coefficients for all three levels of TOP model

filter_blacklist()

Filter sites in ENCODE blacklist regions

filter_mapability()

Title

fit_TOP_M5_model_jags()

Fit TOP quantitative occupancy model with M5 bins using JAGS

fit_TOP_logistic_M5_model_jags()

Fit TOP binary (logistic) model with M5 bins using JAGS

fit_TOP_model()

a wrapper function to fit TOP model for the selected partitions in parallel

flank_fimo_sites()

Get candidate sites using FIMO motifs with flanking regions

get_sites_counts()

Get count matrices around candidate sites

get_total_reads()

Get total number of mapped reads from the idxstats file generated by samtools

load_TOP_samples()

Load TOP posterior samples

merge_normalize_counts()

Merge counts from multiple replicates, then normalize merged counts

millipede_binning()

MILLIPEDE binning

normalize_bin_transform_counts()

Normalize, binning and transform counts

normalize_chip()

Normalize and transform ChIP counts

normalize_counts()

Normalize DNase or ATAC counts

predict_TOP()

Predict quantitative TF occupancy or TF binding probability

predict_TOP_logistic_mean_coef()

Predict TF binding probability by TOP logistic model

predict_TOP_mean_coef()

Predict TF occupancy using posterior mean of regression coefficients

predict_TOP_samples()

Predict TF occupancy using posterior samples of regression coefficients

process_candidate_sites()

Full process to get candidate sites from FIMO result

rev_count_bwtool()

Flip the counts generated from bwtool for motifs on the reverse (minus) strand

scatterplot()

Simple scatter plot

scatterplot_predictions()

Make a scatter plot of measured and predicted occupancy, with Pearson's correlation (R) between measured and predicted occupancy

select_features()

Select PWM and DNase (or ATAC) bin features from the input data frame

select_model_coef_level()

Select regression coefficients by the TOP hierarchy level

Contents

Developed by Kaixuan Luo, Jianling Zhong, Alex Hartemink.
